org.forgerock.openam.scripting

Interface ScriptingLanguage

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SupportedScriptingLanguage

    public interface ScriptingLanguage
    Pluggable interface for adding support for particular scripting languages. Provides a single point to get hold of script engines, validation objects, and so on.
    Since:
    12.0.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ScriptEngine getScriptEngine(ScriptEngineManager scriptEngineManager)
      Gets a script engine for evaluating scripts in this scripting language.
      ScriptValidator getScriptValidator()
      Gets a script validator for validating scripts in this scripting language.

    • Method Detail

      • getScriptEngine

        ScriptEngine getScriptEngine(ScriptEngineManager scriptEngineManager)
        Gets a script engine for evaluating scripts in this scripting language.
        Parameters:
        scriptEngineManager - the JSR 223 script engine manager to use to retrieve the script engine.
        Returns:
        the JSR 223 scripting engine for this language.

      • getScriptValidator

        ScriptValidator getScriptValidator()
        Gets a script validator for validating scripts in this scripting language.
        Returns:
        the validator for this scripting language.
